subject: Re: [sugar] eBook software
body:
Stephen Thorne wrote:

> Is there anyone else working on software for the laptop for the
> purpose of reading text?

There is the Sophie project (http://sophieproject.org), which is both an 
authoring and reader tool. Work is currently under way to integrate it 
into the Sugar environment.
